org.jacpfx.rcp.components.managedFragment

Class ManagedFragmentHandler<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacpfx.rcp.components.managedFragment.ManagedFragmentHandler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the managed fragment

    public class ManagedFragmentHandler<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A managedDialogHandler is the return value of a JACP managed dialog. It wraps access to the managed controller class and the JavaFX root Node of the dialog. A controller must be annotated with @Fragment and can either extend a JavaFX node or specify the url to fxml in the @Fragment annotation. In both cases the result is a controller and a JavaFX Node. if not using fxml the controller and the root node are the same.
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
